Vasopressors

  • Push-Dose EPI 1
    • Mixing
    • Admin
  • References

Push-Dose EPI 1

Mixing

  1. 9mL NS in 10mL syringe
  2. Add 1 mL (100mcg) cardiac epinephrine (0.1mg/mL)
    • Caution: above is for 1mg/10mL (0.1mg/mL) premix syringes, EPI vials are 1mg/1mL
  3. Resulting solution is 100mcg/10mL (10mcg/mL) Epinephrine

Admin

0.5-2mL (5-20 mcg) Q2-5min PRN of above solution\ Doses last $\approx$ 10min\ If mixing not possible, give 0.5mL dose of pure cardiac epi (50mcg)\ DO NOT ADMINISTER 1mg EPI TO INDIVIDUALS NOT IN CARDIAC ARREST

References

  1. Weingart S. Push-dose pressors for immediate blood pressure control. Clinical and Experimental Emergency Medicine. 2015;2(2):131-132. doi:10.15441/ceem.15.010Â ↩
